alert.note: Alert for Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 1:31PM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow expected resulting in low visibilities.. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Wednesday to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon CST /11 AM MST/ Wednesday to 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Daytime wind chill values will remain below zero each day Thursday and Friday.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins
